stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with Microsoft Outlook Theme
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 8 February 2015, a phishing email with the subject "Microsoft Outlook" was observed. The email was sent from "Becky.Apostolos@ohiohealth.com" and included a link to http://www.electro-univers.ro//matei/up-wp/\.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: ----- BEGIN EMAIL HEADERS ----- Received: from mail2010cashuba.medcentral.org (mail2010cashuba.medcentral.org [192.168.178.36]) by proofpointagent2.medcentral.org (8.14.5/8.14.5) with ESMTP id t18CIct3013759 (version=TLSv1/SSLv3 cipher=AES128-SHA bits=128 verify=NOT); Sun, 8 Feb 2015 07:18:38 -0500 Received: from MAIL2010DATAA.medcentral.org ([fe80::cc6d:90a1:d8b2:3b44]) by mail2010cashuba.medcentral.org ([fe80::8541:68e1:7dd8:50ca%17]) with mapi id 14.02.0387.000; Sun, 8 Feb 2015 07:18:36 -0500 From: [REDACTED] <Becky.Apostolos@ohiohealth.com> Subject: Microsoft Outlook Thread-Topic: Microsoft Outlook Thread-Index: AdBDmT8YO8nnJ4SySOKLv2X4bI/XnQ== Date: Sun, 8 Feb 2015 12:18:35 +0000 Message-ID: <5BB17F09AE4C4C46830D6F85CB638FAF010685A593@MAIL2010DATAA.medcentral.org> Accept-Language: en-US Content-Language: en-US X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: x-originating-ip: [116.203.74.46] Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="_000_5BB17F09AE4C4C46830D6F85CB638FAF010685A593MAIL2010DATAA_" MIME-Version: 1.0 X-Proofpoint-Spam-Reason: safe X-Proofpoint-Virus-Version: vendor=nai engine=5400 definitions=5800 signatures=585085 --_000_5BB17F09AE4C4C46830D6F85CB638FAF010685A593MAIL2010DATAA_ Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable ----- END EMAIL HEADERS ----- ----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----- Subject: Microsoft Outlook From: [REDACTED]<Becky.apostolos@ohiohealth.com> SMTP From: prvs=04812ee43b=becky.apostolos@ohiohealth.com; To: SMTP To: [REDACTED RECIPIENT] Date: Sun Feb 08 12:18:35 GMT 2015 Helpdesk Service Centre requires your immediate re-activation of your Email account. This is to upgrade email account to Microsoft Outlook 2015. Inability to complete this procedure will render your account inactivate. Activate by completing the survey procedure. <u>CLICK HERE</u>to activate. IT-Helpdesk Service FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For 2007-2014 -----END EMAIL BODY------
There is no malware analysis for this activity. The <u>"CLICK HERE</u>" link directs to "http://www.electro-univers.ro//matei/up-wp/\".
